result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for displaying project-related components, including individual project cards and a list of recent projects.
result.architecture: The folder follows a component-based architecture typical of React applications, where each file represents a distinct UI component.

src/components/Projects/ProjectCards.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that displays project cards with details and links.
risks: Potential for XSS if props contain untrusted data

src/components/Projects/Projects.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that displays a list of recent projects with descriptions and links.
side_effects: Renders a UI component that displays project information
